name: Monique Martin
text: I love the selection they have to choose from,  the lamps are gorgeous as well as the photos and mirrors

name: Donald
text: The best around.  So knowledgeable. Great service.

name: Keith Hobbs
text: I love shopping at Yellow House. Greg & Jim and their staff are the best!  I especially love that they can take my finds and turn them in to beautiful lamps.They sell so many unusual pieces of silver that I can buy for gifts, and they have a great selection of antique furniture and accessories too.

name: Gregory Riley
text: We'd very much like to apologize for the experience that Ms. George had.  It is by far, very out of character that such a thing would happen in our store.  We have such great employees, when you come in we're at your service to help with whatever needs you may have.

name: Kristen Mosley
text: Yellow House Antiques has such a wide range of pieces for the home and their lamp and shade selection is amazing.

name: Donnie Wright
text: Actually both bus. Very good in helping my needs girlfriend loves the clothing store next door it's out of the world I couldn't believe such low pricing for high-end brands a must stop and shop

name: Alley
text: Very good place. He can also get your brass refinished like on antique clocks and such. Just take your brass off your items and he'll send it off for you. He has good prices and is very responsive to questions and always willing to assist you. I've used him for several years. He also finishes antique door knobs to the finish you would like.  If you don't want to replace those beautiful door knobs then have him to do them. He pays attention to detail and is very organized.

name: chad burgreen
text: Great service, repairs done quickly....he knows his stuff!!

name: Barbara Traylor
text: If you are needed something for one of your antique lamps or kerosene lamps this is the best place to go.  They have a wonderful selection of shades for all the different types of lamps.  They also have a wide variety of pulls for your lamps.  Many beautiful antique lamps for sale also.  They also do repairs on your lamps. Check them out!

name: Carolyn Jones
text: Very expensive,  but very timely in repair.

name: scott devaney
text: Excellent service and speciality items created with fast turnaround​.

name: Jason Stowe
text: Great old lamp sales and repair.
